about_the_game:
Contained here is the full soundtrack for the bizarre world of SPLIT! Also included are some hidden tracks you might not hear in the game, as well as some...secrets here and there?

Each track comes with bonus commentary from the Music Lead, talking through the whole process of writing tracks for the game! Tracks also include their normal version, and a special Split version that plays in-game whenever Splitting yourself apart!

We offer both a standard quality version of each track, as well as a high-quality lossless set which captures the original sound of each track.

Lastly, consider purchasing the soundtrack along with the main game as a discounted bundle!
